string.text: 10 round magazine for the M1 Carbine, modified to load .357 ammunition.
20 round magazine for the M1 Carbine, modified to load .357 ammunition.

15 round magazine for the M1 Carbine, modified to load 5.7x28mm. As part of modifications from 5.7x33 spitfire parts to this current carbine, adjustments were made to facilitate the reliable feeding of 5.7x28 rounds.

30 round magazine for the M1 Carbine, modified to load 5.7x28mm. As part of modifications from 5.7x33 spitfire parts to this current carbine, adjustments were made to facilitate the reliable feeding of 5.7x28 rounds.
